Name: Irony Of Nightmare
About the game: Description You find yourself in a big, empty house. There are Christmas lights around, yet no friends or family. You are alone. Why? Irony Of Nightmare is a game where things aren't as they seem. Those who choose to solve all the puzzles will unreval the true secrets of the house along with a completely different ending. Feature list Plunge into atmosphere of Christmas horror. If you are looking what to play in holidays â€” Irony of Nightmare is a perfect choice. Feel the loneliness. There is only you and uninvited guest in the house. And soon he will catch you. Explore dark and unsettling rooms in search for answers. Hidden messages and puzzles will help you uncover secrets of this strange place
